title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: TPACK-Based Technology Integration in Higher Education Science Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create a conceptual diagram explaining the three core domains of the TPACK framework (technology, content, pedagogy).
Learners can develop specific instructional scenarios applying the TPACK framework to science curriculum design.
Learners can analyze peer instructors' technology integration levels using survey tools and produce analytical reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
